name: Omar's Journey
description:
Once upon a time, there was a young Arab man named Omar who lived in a small village in the Middle East. He felt a sense of longing for his roots and a desire to understand his heritage.

One day, Omar decided to embark on a journey to find his roots. He asked the villagers for their help, but instead of answering him directly, they each gave him a puzzle or riddle to solve.

You play as Omar as you search for your roots!
